name: cfde_portal_prep_specs
title: Transformation of C2M2 model as intermediate ETL, converting to "nid" surrogate keys.

resources.name: id_namespace
resources.title: ID Namespace
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: Dictionary of CFDE-generated identifier namespaces corresponding to top-level C2M2 metadatasets

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this identifier namespace in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this identifier namespace

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace

resources.name: anatomy_canonical
resources.description: Canonical anatomy terms known by CFDE, imported from TSV.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An Uberon CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Uberon term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this Uberon term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

resources.name: anatomy_slim_raw
resources.description: The anatomy slim mapping defined by CFDE, imported from TSV.

fields.name: original_term_id
fields.description: The identifier for the original (more precise) term linked to C2M2 data.

fields.name: slim_term_id
fields.description: The identifier for the slim (more general) term abstracting the C2M2 data.

resources.name: assay_type

fields.name: name

fields.name: synonyms

resources.name: ncbi_taxonomy
resources.title: NCBI Taxonomy
resources.description: List of NCBI Taxonomy Database IDs identifying taxa used to describe subjects in this dataset

fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this taxon in the portal.

fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying a particular taxon

fields.name: clade
fields.description: The phylogenetic level (e.g. species, genus) assigned to this taxon (use 'no rank' if not defined)

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this taxon

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this taxon

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

resources.name: gene
resources.title: gene
resources.description: List of Ensembl genes directly referenced in this C2M2 submission

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this gene term in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An Ensembl gene ID (e.g. 'ENSG00000012048')

fields.name: name
fields.description: The Ensembl 'Name' for this gene (e.g. 'BRCA1')

fields.name: description
fields.description: The Ensembl 'Description' of this gene (e.g. 'BRCA1 DNA repair associated')

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of Ensembl 'Gene synonyms' for this gene (e.g. ['BRCC1', 'FANCS', 'PPP1R53', 'RNF53'])

fields.name: organism
fields.description: The numeric ID of a taxon identifying this gene's source organism

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this term

resources.name: subject_role
resources.title: Subject Role
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The ontological role of an organism-level constituent component of a subject, e.g.: unitary organism (e.g. 'this subject represents a single orchid and that's it'), host, pathogen, symbiont, taxon detected in microbiome, host associated with microbiome, taxon in lineage of cell line, etc.

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject_role in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_role

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_role

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_role

resources.name: subject_granularity
resources.title: Subject Granularity
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The category of a subject in terms of multiplicity, e.g.: single organism; enumerated group of organisms and their relationships to one another (e.g. host X plus endosymbiont Y); host-associated microbiome; environmental microbiome; cell line

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject_granularity in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_granularity

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_granularity

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_granularity

fields.name: slim_term

fields.name: slim_term

resources.name: collection
resources.title: Collection
resources.description: A grouping of files, biosamples and/or subjects

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this collection in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: Numeric ID of the identifier namespace in which this collection is assigned a local_id.

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this collection's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this collection, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this collection

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this collection

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this collection

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this collection

fields.name: id
fields.description: The concatenated, namespace-qualified id for this collection.

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

resources.name: file
resources.title: File
resources.description: A digital asset

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: Numeric ID of the identifier namespace in which this file is assigned a local_id.

fields.name: project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the primary project within which this file was created

fields.name: file_format
fields.description: Numeric ID for the file_format term describing the digital format of this file (e.g. TSV or FASTQ)

fields.name: compression_format
fields.description: Numeric ID for the compression_format term describing the compression format of this file (e.g. gzip or bzip2)

fields.name: data_type
fields.description: Numeric ID for the data_type term describing information stored in this file (e.g. RNA sequence reads)

fields.name: assay_type
fields.description: Numeric ID for the assay_type term describing the type of experiment that generated the results summarized by this file

fields.name: mime_type
fields.description: Numeric ID for the MIME type describing this file
fields.derivation_sql_join: LEFT JOIN mime_type file_mime_type_fkey ON (src.mime_type = file_mime_type_fkey.id)

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this file, unique in combination with this file's id_namespace.

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC (using, e.g., our minid server) and attached to this file

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this file's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: size_in_bytes
fields.description: The size of this file in bytes

fields.name: uncompressed_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The total decompressed size in bytes of the contents of this file

fields.name: sha256
fields.description: The output of the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function after being run on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: md5
fields.description: The output of the MD5 message-digest algorithm after being run as a cryptographic hash function on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information.

fields.name: bundle_collection
fields.description: Numeric ID for the collection representing the sub-files of this archive (bundle) file.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The concatenated, namespace-qualified id for this file.

resources.name: subject_role_taxonomy
resources.title: Subject Role Taxonomy
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a subject, (2) a subject_role (a named organism-level constituent component of a subject, like 'host', 'pathogen', 'endosymbiont', 'taxon detected inside a microbiome subject', etc.) and (3) a taxonomic label (which is hereby assigned to this particular subject_role within this particular subject)

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The numeric ID of this subject

fields.name: role
fields.description: The numeric ID of the role assigned to this organism-level constituent component of this subject

fields.name: taxon
fields.description: The numeric ID of an ncbi_taxonomy taxon
